message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI. 

The paper focuses on community question answering (CQA) and proposes a joint learning model for answer selection and answer summary generation. This involves natural language processing techniques such as pointer-generator networks and text summarization. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also involves information retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques, as well as machine learning (cs.LG) and social and information networks (cs.SI) which are relevant to CQA.
